post.title: TELL US WHAT YOU NEED DONE
post.subtitle: Contact skilled freelancers within minutes, View profiles, ratings, portfolios and chat with them. Pay the freelancer only when you are 100% satisfied with their work.
post.tellus: Tell us more about your project
post.attachfiledescription: Drag & drop any images or documents that might be helpful in explaining your brief here (Max file size: 25 MB)
post.enterup: Enter up to 5 skills that best describe your project. Free lancers will use these skills to find projects they are most interested and experienced in.
post.suggestedskills: NET, PHP, MySQL, Software Architecture, Software Testing
post.howwouldyoulike: How would you like to get it done?
post.highlight: Based on the description you have written, we recommend posting a project. Work with a freelancer 1-on-1 and only pay them when you’re happy whqth the completed work.
post.projectdescription1: Receive free quotes, best for when you have a specific idea, the project is not visual in nature or the project is complex.
post.projectdescription2: Crowdsource ideas. Post a prize and get competing entries which you can iterate on with feedback. Great for visual designs.
post.howtopay: How do you want to pay?
post.paydescription1: Hire based on an hourly rate and pay for hours billed. Best for ongoing work
post.paydescription2: Agree on a price and release payment when the job is done. Best for one-off tasks
post.whattypeofproject: What type of project are you posting?
post.postingtypedescription1: Free to post, your project will go live instantly and start receiving bids within seconds.
post.postingtypedescription2: You’ll get connected to one of our expert staff right away to help find the perfect freelancer.
post.recruiterbio: One of our experts will find and recommend the prefect freelancer for your job. Take out the guesswork and save time with a Recruiter. This is the best experience for new users.

footer.description: Welcome to ReadyMade, the premier destination for businesses and freelancers to connect and collaborate in the Arab world. Whether you're a talented professional seeking new opportunities or a company in need of top-notch services, our platform offers an intuitive, secure, and efficient way to get things done. With our diverse pool of experts, flexible pricing, and comprehensive support, you can rest assured that your project will be completed to the highest standards. Join us today and start realizing your goals!
